metadata.title: USN-4437-1 -- libslirp vulnerability
metadata.description: Ziming Zhang and VictorV discovered that libslirp incorrectly handled replying to certain ICMP echo requests. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause libslirp to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4437-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libslirp0 - 4.1.0-2ubuntu2.1 libslirp-dev - 4.1.0-2ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
